metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12094 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Horde Groupware Webmail Edition through 5.2.22 allows XSS via an admin/user.php?form=update_f&user_name= or admin/user.php?form=remove_f&user_name= or admin/config/diff.php?app= URI.

notes.Note: sbeattie> tagcloud portion of vuln is believed to be in php-horde-core

criterions.comment: php-horde-core: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
php-horde-trean: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
